AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.headline: Who I Am
AboutMe.description: My name is Niko, and programming is my passion. I'm enthusiastic about developing solutions that simplify or automate processes. I'm motivated by solving problems through technology and making things more efficient. I place great value on clear structures and well-thought-out workflows.
AboutMe.location: I live in a privately owned home in Rheinböllen, a town on the edge of the beautiful Hunsrück region – peacefully located and therefore perfect for coding. Ideal for remote work.
AboutMe.cognition: Through regular further education, I expand my knowledge and learn new technologies and ways of working. Challenges motivate me to grow continuously and to strive for new, innovative solutions.
AboutMe.quality: Thanks to my solution-oriented approach, I think analytically and persistently until a good and satisfying solution is found. I enjoy working in a team, sharing my knowledge, and find it exciting to develop and implement new ideas together.

Skills.title: Skill Set
Skills.headline: Technologies
Skills.description: I am currently working intensively with Angular and have gained extensive experience with this framework through my previous projects. Additionally, I regularly work with Firebase, integrate APIs, and use Git for version control. I approach new technologies and tools with enthusiasm. Continuous learning and further development are, for me, an essential part of being a developer.
Skills.contactMe: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
Skills.popup: I have a special interest in learning

Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.headline: Portfolio
Projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

dataProjects.name: Join
dataProjects.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

dataProjects.name: El Pollo Loco
dataProjects.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

dataProjects.name: DA Bubble
dataProjects.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

Contact.title: Let's work together
Contact.headline: Contact me
Contact.headline2: I look forward to hearing from you!
Contact.description: Are you looking for support for your project? I am open to exciting challenges – especially in the field of frontend development. Together, we can develop solutions that truly make a difference. Let's connect and see how I can enrich your team or project with my experience.
